metadata.feature_description: Client-side page management interface with React components

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Content > Pages panel
steps.expected: Page tree should render with all pages displayed hierarchically
steps.actual: Page tree loaded successfully showing hierarchical page structure with expand/collapse controls

steps.action: Click [EXPAND ALL] to expand the page tree
steps.expected: All nested pages should be visible in expanded state
steps.actual: Tree expanded showing all nested pages including Community children (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, etc.)

steps.action: Click on a page item (News) to view details
steps.expected: Page details panel should update to show selected page information
steps.actual: Details panel updated showing News page with tabs (Details, Permissions, Advanced), page info, and form fields

steps.action: Drag BulkValidateTest1 page and drop it onto BulkValidateTest2 page
steps.expected: Page should be moved as a child of the target page with success notification
steps.actual: Page was successfully moved under BulkValidateTest2, success message 'Page updated successfully' displayed

steps.action: Resize browser viewport to mobile dimensions (375x667)
steps.expected: UI should adapt to mobile viewport with responsive layout
steps.actual: UI adapted correctly to mobile viewport - page tree remained usable, controls accessible, layout adjusted appropriately

steps.expected: Page list should filter in real-time to show matching pages
steps.actual: Search results updated in real-time showing 'Page Search Results' heading with '6 PAGES FOUND' - displaying Workflow Test Page, Workflow Test Page New, Workflow Publish Test, Workflow Test Page New Approval, Child Page Workflow Test, and Workflow Test New Page

steps.action: Clear the required Name field and click Save
steps.expected: Validation error should be displayed preventing save
steps.actual: Error notification appeared at bottom of screen: 'Tab Name is Empty' with error icon, save operation was blocked

steps.expected: Warning dialog should appear asking user to confirm losing changes
steps.actual: Warning dialog displayed with message 'Are you sure you want to close? Changes have been made and will be lost. Do you wish to continue?' with 'Go Back' and 'Continue' buttons

steps.action: Click 'Add Page' button to load new page form
steps.expected: Form should load with appropriate transition and all elements rendered
steps.actual: Add Page form loaded instantly with all elements: Details/Permissions/Advanced tabs, page type selector (Standard/Existing/URL/File), form fields (Name, Title, Description), template gallery with 25+ templates displayed

observations: The JavaScript UI components use a combination of Knockout.js for page hierarchy management and React for specific features like Link Tracking and Workflow bulk operations
Page thumbnails are generated dynamically using iframes with fallback handling for failed thumbnail generation
The UI supports both list view and card view modes, controlled via viewModelExtension.js
Mobile support is implemented through dedicated initMobile and loadMobile functions in both Pages.js and EvoqPages.js
The page tree supports real-time search filtering with advanced filters option
Drag and drop uses jQuery UI with custom proxy elements for visual feedback during drag operations
